languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт не отводит глаз, даже когда вы приближаетесь. С ее уст не срываются ни мольбы, ни проклятия. Время слов прошло, как только вы подняли оружие против ее собратьев.{/n}
{n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. No curse or word escapes her lips. The time for words ended the moment you took up arms against her kin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт не отводит глаз, даже когда вы приближаетесь. С ее уст не срываются ни мольбы, ни проклятия. Время слов прошло, как только вы подняли оружие против ее собратьев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. Not a curse nor a word escape her lips. The time of words has ended as soon as you raised your weapon against her kin.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. Not a curse nor a word escape her lips. The time of words has ended as soon as you raised your weapon against her kin.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. No curse or word escapes her lips. The time for words ended the moment you took up arms against her kin.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet no aparta la mirada cuando te aproximas a ella. No te maldice ni dice palabra. El momento para hablar terminó tan pronto enarbolaste tu arma contra los suyos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. No curse or word escapes her lips. The time for words ended the moment you took up arms against her kin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet no aparta la mirada cuando te aproximas a ella. No profiere insultos ni brota palabra alguna de sus labios. El momento para hablar terminó tan pronto enarbolaste tu arma contra los suyos.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}当你接近她时，伊莉耶特没有移开目光，甚至没有吐出一句咒骂。从你举起武器瞄准她的族人那一刻起，你们之间就已经无话可说了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. No curse or word escapes her lips. The time for words ended the moment you took up arms against her kin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你接近她时，伊莉耶特没有移开目光，甚至没有吐出一句咒骂。当你举起武器对付她的族人时，你们之间就已经无话可说了。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet ne détourne pas le regard quand vous vous approchez d'elle. Aucune insulte ni aucun mot ne franchit ses lèvres. Toute parole est devenue inutile dès lors que vous avez pris les armes contre les siens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. No curse or word escapes her lips. The time for words ended the moment you took up arms against her kin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet ne détourne pas le regard quand vous vous approchez d'elle. Aucune insulte ni aucun mot ne franchit ses lèvres. Toute parole est devenue inutile dès lors que vous avez levé la main contre les siens.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは、あなたが彼女に近づいても視線をそらすことはない。呪いも言葉も発さない。あなたが彼女のキンに対して武器を構えた時点で、言葉を交わす時は終わりを告げたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. No curse or word escapes her lips. The time for words ended the moment you took up arms against her kin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは、あなたが彼女に近づいても視線をそらすことはない。呪いも言葉も発さない。あなたが彼女のキンに対して武器を構えた時点で、言葉を交わす時は終わりを告げたのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet wendet den Blick auch dann nicht ab, als du vor sie trittst. Kein Fluch oder Wort entweicht ihren Lippen. Die Zeit für Worte war vorbei, sobald du die Waffen gegen ihre Verwandten erhoben hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. No curse or word escapes her lips. The time for words ended the moment you took up arms against her kin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet wendet den Blick auch dann nicht ab, als du vor sie trittst. Kein Fluch, kein Wort entweicht ihren Lippen. Die Zeit für Worte war in dem Augenblick beendet, in dem du deine Waffe gegen ihre Sippe erhoben hast.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, ona yaklaştığında bile bakışlarını kaçırmıyor. Dudaklarından ne bir sövgü ne de bir kelime çıkıyor. Soydaşlarına karşı silahına sarıldığın an söylenecek sözlerin vakti zaten sona ermişti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not avert her gaze even when you approach her. No curse or word escapes her lips. The time for words ended the moment you took up arms against her kin.{/n}
